title: Escape To Australia’s First Mirrored Home In The Yarra Valley
description: There are a few famous mirror houses around the world: California has the Invisible House in the Joshua Tree desert. In Sweden, you can stay in a mirrored cube hotel perched above the treetops. Now, Australia has one too. DSTNTN has just opened a new mirror home retreat that almost disappears into the natural surrounds of Victoria’s beautiful Yarra Valley!
author: The Design Files
